segments.text: Hello , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . No matter what ’ s wrong with it , I can surely meet your satisfaction .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Look at the toe of this shoe . It is worn out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , here . I ’ m afraid it ’ ll be difficult to repair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I can . To tell you the truth , I ’ m the best nearby .
segments.speaker: S1
